title: 95/151/EC: Commission Decision of 28 April 1995 amending Commission Decision 93/494/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from the Faroe Islands (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 April 1995 amending Commission Decision  93/494/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from the Faroe Islands  (Text with EEA relevance) (95/151/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 93/494/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this  Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 April 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX
'ANNEX B >TABLE>
II.  Factory ships >TABLE>
